name: MLCActivationDescriptor
desc: A configuration object you use to create an activation layer.

items.name: init?(type: MLCActivationType)
items.desc: Creates an activation descriptor with the activation type you specify.

items.name: init?(type: MLCActivationType, a: Float)
items.desc: Creates an activation descriptor with the activation type and parameter a that you specify.

items.name: init?(type: MLCActivationType, a: Float, b: Float)
items.desc: Creates an activation descriptor with the activation type and parameters a and b that you specify.

items.name: init?(type: MLCActivationType, a: Float, b: Float, c: Float)
items.desc: Creates an activation descriptor with the activation type and parameters a, b, and c that you specify.

items.name: enum MLCActivationType
items.desc: An activation type that you specify for an activation descriptor.

items.name: var a: Float
items.desc: The parameter a to the activation function.

items.name: var b: Float
items.desc: The parameter b to the activation function.

items.name: var c: Float
items.desc: The parameter c to the activation function.
